amendment.description: An amendment printed 7 printed in House Report 111-3 to require the Federal Reserve to disclose detailed information regarding the Federal Reserves Mortgage-Backed Securities purchase program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed 7 printed in House Report 111-3 to require the Federal Reserve to disclose detailed information regarding the Federal Reserves Mortgage-Backed Securities purchase program.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Murphy, Patrick.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy, Patrick amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 0 (Roll no. 22).
